author: tfischer
msg: Fixed sql statement execution for the maven 2 plugin for postgresql by setting autocommit=true as default.
(autocommit=true is also default in the ant task and in the maven 1 goal)

author: tfischer
msg: the TEXT sql type has no size and scale in postgresql; added that information to the platform info in the generator

author: dennisl
msg: Move rules to the appropriate section.
Make the comments for the different sections of the file stand out more.

author: brett
msg: add a link to the current content to avoid the empty space

author: tfischer
msg: Reduced the loglevel of the messages about which dtd source is used from info to debug.
Usually the user is not interested in from where the dtd comes, and if he is he can switch to debug.
